This defect will not be valid for M2 since validation has been disabled in the
document loader. 

The core problem is that the XML parser was set to validate the document, but it
could not locate the DTD associated with it. We will need to address this issue
in M3.
No longer an issue in current builds

Has validation been re-enabled? Without the validation enabled, this problem
will not show up.

Are we shipping the DTD/XSDs now? And have we enabled the Schema validation for
Xerces parsers?
